message: Bob, I have a product that I believe would be very valuable to you. While I can't disclose specifics yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $15000 to me. I'm offering it to you for $20000, giving you a chance to acquire something potentially exceptional.  If you're interested, let me know and we can discuss further.  If not, I'll be selling it to another buyer for $15000.
